solution_line_template: He has already done {jacks_done_this_week} this week because {sunday_jacks} + {monday_jacks} + {wednesday_jacks} + {thursday_jacks} + {friday_jacks} = <<{sunday_jacks}+{monday_jacks}+{wednesday_jacks}+{thursday_jacks}+{friday_jacks}={jacks_done_this_week}>>{jacks_done_this_week}.

If he does {jacks_to_match_last_week} he will have done as many as last week because {last_week_total_jacks} - {jacks_done_this_week} = <<{last_week_total_jacks}-{jacks_done_this_week}={jacks_to_match_last_week}>>{jacks_to_match_last_week}
He has to do {jacks_needed_saturday} on Saturday because {jacks_to_match_last_week} + {one_more_jack} = <<{jacks_to_match_last_week}+{one_more_jack}={jacks_needed_saturday}>>{jacks_needed_saturday}
